page.title: 14PARACHUTING - ARGUMENTS FOR
page.content:
As working hours are reduced and unemployment rises, there is a greater demand for leisure facilities of all kinds.
Parachuting is becoming an increasingly popular sport and we are fortunate to have the space and facilities available locally. The parachuting centre has been developed on an abandoned airfield and so good use is being made of disused land.
The sport provides an exhilarating experience and a great deal of pleasure for a large number of people. It can also produce a fascinating spectacle for people in an area where sporting facilities are rather limited. This activity has also raised considerable amounts of money for charity.
